Class GlossaryHandler

java.lang.Object
org.odpi.openmetadata.frameworks.openmetadata.handlers.OpenMetadataHandlerBase
org.odpi.openmetadata.frameworks.openmetadata.handlers.GlossaryHandler
public class GlossaryHandler extends OpenMetadataHandlerBase
CollectionHandler describes how to maintain and query glossaries.
